heading: HR01427
0: A RESOLUTION EXPRESSING THE APPRECIATION OF A GRATEFUL NATION TO RICARDO CARDINAL J. VIDAL, ARCHBISHOP EMERITUS OF CEBU, AND THE GRIEF OF ITS PEOPLE OVER THE PASSING AWAY OF THE GOOD CARDINAL-PRIEST LAST OCTOBER 18, 2017, RECOGNIZING AND LAUDING HIS THIRTY-FIVE (35) YEARS OF SERVICE AS SPIRITUAL LEADER AND PEACEMAKER, TO CEBUANOS AND TO THE NATION
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2017-11-20
